"
Get the data from Intent
*Only the value saved by Intent PutExtra block can be retrieved
*Get the empty string() when the key does not exist
*You need to add 'Intent' in [Component] to use this "
Sets the specified variable to the condition

"
Adds the given amount of time to the Calendar field
*Positive Value : adds time
*Negative Value : subtracts time
*You need to add 'Calendar' from [Component] to use this"

"
Get the differences between the given calendars (time)
Unit : Seconds
*You need to add 'Calendar' from [Component] to use this "

"
Formats the Calendar as a string using the pattern
Year(y) | Month(m) | Day(d)
Hour(h) 1~12 | Hour(H) 0~23 | Minute(M) | Second(s)
Ex : yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss ( 2106-01-01 03:01:02 )
Ex : yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss ( 2106-01-01 15:01:02 )
Ex : yyyy-MM-dd ( 2106-01-01 )
Ex : hh:mm:ss ( 12:01:02 )
*A run-time error if the given string format is invalid
*You need to add 'Calendar' from [Component] to use this "

"
Get the current date and time
*You need to add 'Calendar' from [Component] to use this "

"
Sets the Calendar field to a specific value
*You need to add 'Calendar' from [Component] to use this "

"
Get the status of a checkbox
True if checked, else false"

"
Set the status of a checkbox
Checked if set true, else unchecked"
The condition for checking if two strings are equal

"
Retrieve a value from the preference file
The value saved by File SetData block can be retrieved
*You need to add 'File(Shared Preference)' from [Component] to use this "
remove file data with the following key

"
Set a value in the preference file
*Application can have multiple files and a file can have multiple values
*the keys in the file must be unique. If same key is used several times, only the latest saved value is accessible
*format - key : value
Ex) key : new_memo , value : hello
*You need to add 'File(Shared Preference)' from [Component] to use this "

A loop that will never end
* this must be used with stop block
Get the text the widget is displaying

"
Checks the condition - if the condition is true, the blocks inside the first C will activate, and if the condition is false, the blocks inside the second C will activate
"
Checks the condition - if the condition is true, the blocks inside it will activate
When application is executed, the block activates
Sets the specified variable to the number

"
Bind the data to Intent

*Send to Activity with key : value format


*Intent can have multiple keys and values
*You need to add 'Intent' in [Component] to use this "

"
Set the Intent action to be performed

Intent : a component for load a Activity(view)
-ACTION_CALL : Perform a call to someone specified by the data(permission:CALL_PHONE)
-ACTION_DIAL : Dial a number as specified by the data(no permission)
-ACTION_VIEW : Display the data to the user
*You need to add 'Intent' in [Component] to use this "

"
Set the data this Intent is operating on

-ACTION_CALL : must start with tel:
(EX:tel:021111111)
-ACTION_DIAL : must start with tel:
(EX:tel:021111111)
-ACTION_VIEW : must follow URL form starting with http: or https:
(EX: http://google.com)
*A run-time error may occur if you don't follow the recommendation
*You need to add 'Intent' in [Component] to use this "

"
Set the Activity(View) to be performed
*You need to add 'Intent' in [Component] to use this "
An index is either negative or greater than or equal to the size of the list
An integer cannot be divided by zero
An index is either negative or greater than the size of the string
Thrown to indicate that the application has attempted to convert a string to one of the numeric types
Unreachable statement or stop block outside repeat block or forever block
<h4>Occurred when parameters of Intent is invalid</h4
The two values put right next to each other
Adds an item to the list (the item goes at the bottom of the list of items) with the specified content in it

"
The condition for checking if an item's content is the specified text
"
Adds an item to the list (the item goes where you specify in the list of items) with the specified content in it.
How many items there are in the specified list

"
Get the number of selected ListView items
Only Works when the ChoiceMode for the ListView is either single or multi "

"
Get the index of selected ListView item
Only Works when the ChoiceMode for the ListView is either single or multi "

"
Get an array of indices for the selected ListView items
Only Works when the ChoiceMode for the ListView is either single or multi "

"
Select a ListView item at a given index
Only Works when the ChoiceMode for the ListView is either single or multi
Setting an index greater than the number of items in the ListView will result in runtime error "
The condition for checking if a value is greater than the other
The condition for checking if a value is less than the other
The condition for checking if two values are equal
Makes the condition checked if it is false, not true
Joins two conditions, but they function separately
Picks a random number between the two limits
A loop that repeats for the specified amount
Sets the background color for the widget
Sets the enabled state of the widget
Sets selected image as the content of the ImageView

"
Set ListView Data
Setting the data for a ListView
Data Format: String"

"
Set Spinner Data

Set Spinner Data
Data Format: String"
Sets the text color of the widget

"
Set the visibility of a widget
Visibility Properties
- VISIBLE : This view is visible
- INVISIBLE : This view is invisible, but it still takes up space for layout purposes
- GONE : This view is invisible, and it doesn't take any space for layout purposes"

"
Get the index of selected spinner item/h5>
Index starts from 0"

"
Refresh Spinner
Refresh List Item using Spinner "

"
Select a spinner item at a given index
Setting an index greater than the number of items in the spinner will result in runtime error "

"
Launch a new Activity by Intent
*A run-time error may occur if the Intent parameters is invalid
*You need to add 'Intent' in [Component] to use this "
The first index of the given string, or -1
Sets the specified variable to the string
A string containing the given subsequence of the string
Returns a string with no spaces at the beginning or end

Only use letters(a-z), numbers and Special characters(.),(@)

Only use letters(a-z), numbers and Special characters(_)
Only use small letters(a-z), numbers and special character(_)

"Touch this area And select an image you want to add"
Explain about your application in a few sentences
This will be the title for the post
Create an application that outputs an input string
Create a Baseball - Bulls and Cows game
You can make a source code to be linked specific URL
Create a clicking speed test application
Create a match pairs memory game
Create an application that gets current time
"Use a widget that takes a user input Add a function to a button Show a message box (Toast)"
"Select rock, paper, or scissors A.I. also chooses rock, paper, or scissors Compare and decide who won"

"Select a random 3-digit number Digits must be all different You can delete one digit at a time Decide strike(Bulls) or ball(Cows) * strike(Bulls) if you guess the right digit in right position * ball(Cows) if the digit you guessed in different positions * example : Random Number - 123, Your Guess: 132 * output : 1 strike, 2 ball Record your attempts Continue until you guess the correct number"
"Arithmetic operations (+, -, x, /) Don't allow divisions by zero "
"Save title and message Show the saved list of memos Edit the saved memo Delete the saved memo Start a new activity for Memo Editor "
"Set specific URL Implement slide menu You can use a Calling function Implement back to the top"
"Place random numbers Check the clicking sequence Disable clicked numbers Show the time taken"
"Place pictures in random positions Display hidden images on start If two selected pictures are the same, then display them; otherwise, hide them Stop when all pictures are displayed "
"Add a calendar component Set date format "
"Take an input URL string Open the browser using Intent "
"Generate a random number between 0 to 9 Compare the input number to the random number Notify the input number is bigger or less than the random number "
"Generate a random number between 1 and 45 each time a button is clicked Duplicate numbers are not allowed "
